) O

very O
quickly O
. O
This O
often O
leads O
to O
Leg/foot B-Disease
pain I-Disease
. O
Comparable O
to O
fatigue O
after O
a O
long O
workout O
. O
I O
have O
been O
taking O
Lipitor B-Drug
- I-Drug
for O
about O
4 O
yrs O
- O
the O
Aging B-Disease
the I-Disease
muscle I-Disease
- I-Disease
has O
become O
worse O
with O
time O
and O
now O
will O
'act O
' O
up O
very O
soon O
even O
with O
a O
short O
slow O
walk O
. O
This O
has O
severely O
hampered O
my O
ability O
to O
excercise O
. O
I O
first O
thought O
this O
was O
a O
response O
to O
the O
Diabetes B-Disease
but O
was O
recently O
made O
aware O
that O
Lipitor B-Drug
- I-Drug
may O
be O
causing O
it O
. O
Lipitor B-Drug
- I-Drug
did O
lower O
my O
chloesterol O
soon O
after O
starting O
it O
. O

now O

2 O

factors O
, O

over O
70 O
and O
with O
Hypothyroidism B-Disease
. O
The O
inquest O
verdict O
was O
misadventure O
. O
The O
GMC O
decided O
that O
the O
20 O
mg O
dose O
was O
reasonable O
, O
and O
that O
the O
GP O
had O
not O
acted O

by O
prescribing O
this O
dose O
. O
So O
much O
for O

and O

statins O

. O

, O
despite O
the O
usual O
dose O
being O
10 O
mg O
and O
him O
having O
2 O
risk O
factors O
, O
being O
over O
70 O
and O
with O
. O
The O
inquest O
verdict O
was O
misadventure O
. O
The O
GMC O
decided O
that O
the O
20 O
mg O
dose O
was O
reasonable O
, O
and O
that O
the O
GP O
had O
not O
acted O
inappropriately O
by O
prescribing O
this O
dose O
. O
So O
much O
for O
SPCs O
, O
PILs O
, O
and O
the O
CSM O
's O
Pharmacovigilance O
reports O
, O
all O
of O
which O
state O
that O
the O
usual O
dose O
is O
10 O
mg O
a O
day O

and O
that O
statins O
should O
be O
used O
with O
caution O
by O
patients O
over O
70 O
and O
with O

GPs O
will O
continue O

if O
they O

get O

with O
